Title: Object: Saladin Soldan d'Egypte
Description: Portrait of Saladin, Sultan of Egypt and Syria, half-length, directed and looking to the left, bearded, wearing turban, right hand touching his beard; illustration to page 627 of Andre Thevet's "Les vrais pourtraits et vies des hommes illustres" (Paris: 1584) Engraving and etching
Associated titles: Les vrais pourtraits et vies des hommes illustres grecz, latins et payens
Acquisition notes: 1879,1213.92 to 315 is a set of the portraits illustrating Thevet's 'Vies des Hommes Illustres' of 1584.
